tweets.text: The Air Quality Cell have set up an air quality monitoring unit today as part of the response to the large fire on Upper Castle Street, #Bradford. This monitoring will be used to confirm the public health risk advice given by Public Health England. https://t.co/oIc6dc9upa
To buy your fishing licence visit https://t.co/h54cBUjB6C  #Walsall #Fishing.  üé£

The #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme will be delivered in three phases. 

Phase one will be constructed in Kendal with phases two & three being in Burneside, Staveley and Ings.
 
More details about the three phases can be found online at https://t.co/MGRW7UHwzo

Protecting the environment is at the heart of what we do. 

That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre adding an additional ¬£40m to our Green Recovery Challenge Fund! 

Find out more here: https://t.co/G06XlxXBiS https://t.co/PPA2o8tdv0
@LockTask Good morning, Thank you for posting this tweet , I have forwarded to our national incident team - Eileen

Righty ho, just picked up #Incident #Duty Manager for the week for #WestMidlands from @MarkBowersEA. I‚Äôm scared to use the ‚ÄòQ‚Äô word, so let‚Äôs say things look ‚Äòsteady‚Äô instead. Although at home, all our duty folk are providing 24/7 cover for whatever gets chucked our way #TeamEA https://t.co/hvyrQPe8hv
You can read more about the sample flood wall panels being planned as part of the #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme via @TheFloodHub ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/zO6iwozv8B https://t.co/885VzowPSx

We‚Äôre at Chiswell #Dorset today (we really are today!) testing the #flood sirens at 10am and 1pm. We do this every year to make sure they are working should they be needed. They will be loud! #PrepareActSurvive
@moorsforfuture @SwallowDave @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyNW Thanks for that, I'll share it with the group. I'm sure that they'll be reassured by the work that you're doing.

Huge team effort ongoing on the #bradfordfire

Teams from @WYFRS @WestYorksPolice @YorksAmbulance @bradfordmdc @PHE_YorksHumber @EnvAgencyYNE are doing an amazing job working together to keep the public safe üëè

If you live locally, please continue to keep windows & doors closed. https://t.co/JKhdrTEzzu

@AndyDuncanMJ @SwallowDave @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyNW Great to hear! Looking at the catchment boundaries, the gully blocks are in gullies that feed both sides so it should influence the Wineshaw & Walkerwood reservoirs as well as Carrbrook / Mossley / Micklehurst.

Some amazing #fantasticfutures being shared in this afternoon's workshops by our wonderful @STEMAmbassadors - learning about the environment and the work of the @EnvAgency - we have 1000 pupils joining us - WOW! With @STEMteamHUB_TP

@moorsforfuture @SwallowDave @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyNW This looks great. Which part of the moor is it on? I'm part of a flooding support group for Micklehurst in Mossley, and am wondering whether it will help to reduce peak flows on Castle Clough/ Staley Brook? Or is it likely to benefit the Walkerwood area more for now?
@FlintPCo @PfieldSociety The new one in the @waitrose car park? We‚Äôve witnessed dirty/used water draining into the Tilmore Brook from this @EnvAgency

tweets.text: With more rain forecasted we getting to very high level of flood via River Quaggy, normally river is about four feet below bridge. But floods do recede quickly. Not had flood gates shut yet by @EnvAgencySE, @Thames21 @qwag pic by @johnjimson https://t.co/1fF9zB7glJ

You can read our latest update regarding the fire at Upper Castle Street using the link below. 

Messages from @bradfordmdc, @EnvAgencyYNE & updates from @WestYorksPolice on road closures are all included. 

https://t.co/2VKfSL5rTI https://t.co/pCJjTHsouE

Throughout the next few weeks, we will share key stats about the ¬£76mil Flood Risk Management Scheme in #Kendal which, when complete, will help better protect 1,480 homes & 1,151 business from #flooding.

Key information available on @thefloodhub & via https://t.co/F4fe5jNVEN https://t.co/ZcSyNT5Shq

It's #TransAwarenessWeek.

To mark the week, Gemma Kinsey reflects on a childhood memory of looking up at her mum's new sewing machine.

Read the blog post here: https://t.co/HaJgiVEH8X 

#Stonewall100 #TeamEA

tweets.text: @DeTom48 @EnvAgencySE Hi Debbie - good to 'bump' in to you on here. Looks like a grand job, love the Nailbourne! PS I am still recovering from that time 8 or so years ago when we went mountain biking, I sold the bike weeks later and bought a tent! üòÑüòÑ

#StourFieldTeam really enjoyed removing overgrown vegetation and exposing this idyllic chalk bed stream, this work reduces #FloodRisk and improves habitat. The silt washed away leaving a beautiful chalk and gravel stream #Nailbourne #Kent ‚Å¶@EnvAgencySE‚Å© https://t.co/9PtIEAXADj

#WasteCrime is so much more than simply fly-tipping.

Waste criminals may dump waste on your land or property illegally, leaving you with the cost of clearing up.

Secure your premises and report suspicious waste activities anonymously to Crimestoppers online or call 0800 555 111 https://t.co/exrBNrP3jo

River users in Northumberland are being asked to ‚Äòcheck, clean, dry‚Äô to help prevent the spread of diseases & safeguard the future of native white-clawed crayfish in the River Wansbeck after increased reports of invasive signal crayfish in the River Coquet https://t.co/cAPO74ouLi https://t.co/ZSoZOnuIpu
This is very serious - #vets must do more to stop this pollution of water courses. @RiverThameCT @RiverChess  @Cuttle_Brook @EnvAgency @Chilternstreams https://t.co/MU0sNZF6BQ

If you live in #Radcliffe and #Redvales and want to know how work on the ¬£40m #flood scheme is progressing, take a look at our latest community newsletter now live on @TheFloodHub ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/XFoIIh8lOK

Congrats to Ewan Cronin, Rachael Hurst & Phil Wadley for winning studentship bursaries to study MSc Sustainable Water Management @LancsUniLEC @LancasterUni. Awarded by @britishhydrosoc in collaboration with @EnvAgency & @JBATrust. 
See BHS Circulation 147: https://t.co/CORQBPrHND https://t.co/8E8SU2AhF8

'Every single UK school will receive funding to create a garden.'

         Imagine that headline.

Good morning Planetüåé

https://t.co/ZiTkuk1tER

@educationgovuk @EnvAgency @simon_reeve https://t.co/OYKFdhlT1r

Great working with @WildTroutTrust and Dorset Arms Angling Club to support our native #trout in the #Eridge Stream, which flows into the River #Medway. Adding gravel provides spawning grounds for other fish too and benefits invertebrates AND encourages plant growth!
@Nus_Ghani https://t.co/t10CZHq0zw

Bit by bit we‚Äôre opening our rivers back up for fish! 

Last week, @GroundworkGM @greatermcr  @natural_course and #TeamEA removed this disused failing weir on the River Tonge as part of a partnership project to help üêü swim freely and reach their natural spawning grounds https://t.co/cwHYCcEW6X

Artist Clare Ashton of Todmorden says this year there will be a greater impact than ever on anyone whose home is flooded.

Read her story
https://t.co/OqdkZb8nDm

Taking action before a flood could keep the things you care about safe #prepareactsurvive https://t.co/wwueotBnkz https://t.co/bbHBhUd8Gt

We need to demolish Shade Chapel to open up the culvert beneath it to help reduce the flood risk for people in Todmorden. 

Part of Rochdale Road will be closed from 8pm on Fri 27 Nov until 6am Mon 30 Nov so that the work can be carried out safely.

https://t.co/j8x6wTIfoD https://t.co/NsQltBv5y8

Would you know what to do in the event of a flood? 

5.2 million homes and businesses in England are at risk of flooding. Don't assume it won't happen to you. Find out how you can #PrepareActSurvive üëá

https://t.co/a9sZgdRGHP

#FloodActionWeek https://t.co/WrdSzNfPqb

There is a flood warning in place along the Essex coast at Coalhouse Fort and surrounding marshland‚ö†Ô∏è

Make sure you don't put yourself in danger by walking along coastal paths. 

Read more about the warning here: https://t.co/Arj9aE0n71 #Essex #Safety https://t.co/wVTeZaCWHb

Never drive through flood water ‚Äì it‚Äôs not worth the risk. 

Not only can flood water damage your car but it can be life threatening. 

Always check your route before you travel #RoadSafetyWeek
